name: Change Partnership
goal:
Change Partnership is an independent thought and organising platform. Its mission is to solve the politics of climate change.

This is achieved by bringing together government, business and civil society to introduce policies and regulations to reduce emissions and manage the transition to a sustainable global economy.
interests: Climate Action, Competition, Development, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Enterprise, Environment, External Relations, General and Institutional Affairs, Internal Market, Regional Policy, Research and Technology, Trade, Transport
euInitiatives: Climate change, energy union, carbon capture and storage (CCS), industrial regeneration and just transition.
